ra139_2013

Class IntegerVerifierTest

  • java.lang.Object
    • ra139_2013.IntegerVerifierTest

  • public class IntegerVerifierTest
extends java.lang.Object
    Tests IntegerVerifier behavior when validating input fields with SQL data type INTEGER.
    Author:
    Jelena

      • testEmptyMandatoryInput

        Check if MANDATORY empty fields are marked as invalid. IntegerVerifier.verify(javax.swing.JComponent) should return false in order for test to pass

        Check if NON-MANDATORY empty fields are marked as valid. IntegerVerifier.verify(javax.swing.JComponent) should return true in order for test to pass
